mapper.insert: insert into user(user_name, password, role_id, email, phone, avatar, school, sex, description, gmt_create, gmt_modified, status) values (#{user.phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.roleId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{user.email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.avatar, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.school, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.sex, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.gmtCreate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{user.gmtModified, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{user.status, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.user_name, u.password, u.role_id, u.email, u.phone, u.avatar, u.school, u.sex, u.description, u.gmt_create, u.gmt_modified, u.status from user u where phone = #{phone}
select u.user_id, u.user_name, u.password, u.role_id, u.email, u.phone, u.avatar, u.school, u.sex, u.description, u.gmt_create, u.gmt_modified, u.status from user u where email = #{email}

select u.user_id userId, u.user_name userName, u.password, u.role_id roleId, u.email, u.phone, u.avatar, u.school, u.sex, u.description, u.gmt_create gmtCreate, u.gmt_modified gmtModified, u.status from user u where user_id = #{userId}
